name: CodeOasis
description:
Our mission is your success!Â 
Founded in 2004, CodeOasis employs 60 full stack engineers in both our open source and .net departments. We focus business ROI and make fast progress based on customers feedback. We deliver a full lifecycle of development: product and project management, UI/UX design, development, system administration, and QA.
We adapt to your company's scale and equip our team to handle projects on any scale; from start-ups to large upscale companies.
